author: Euripides
message: The wisest men follow their own direction.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Sloane Coffin
message: Hope arouses, as nothing else can arouse, a passion for the possible.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pema Chodron
message: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
title: Thought of the day
